---
title: "Example paper"
output: pdf_document
fontsize: 12pt
geometry: margin=1.0in
---

```{r knitr_settings, eval=TRUE, echo=FALSE, cache=FALSE}
knitr::opts_knit$set(
  eval = TRUE,
  echo = FALSE
  fig.path = "figures/",
  dpi = 300
)
```

```{r deps}
library(knitr)
```

```{r fig-div, fig.cap = "**Figure 1.** Diversity"}
include_graphics('figures/figure_1.png')
```

```{r fig-error, fig.cap = "**Figure 2.** Error Rates"}
include_graphics('figures/figure_2.png')
```
